ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06

Class ClaimantEditClaimActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.ClaimantEditClaimActivity

  • public class ClaimantEditClaimActivity
extends Activity
    This ClaimantEditClaimActivity class is an extended class of Activity class. This class controls the User Interface of editing Claim detail for claimant. This view displays the detail of Claim and allows claimant to change and update the information. It will be used when the claimant asks to edit the claim detail.
    Version:
    03/16/2015
    Author:
    CMPUT301W15T06
